Cargo Movement Type Description: The shipper/ consignee or its agent or subcontractor is responsible for stuffing or stripping the cargo into or out of the container and bears every responsibility and liability in such respect.
The carrier or its agent or subcontractor is responsible for stuffing or stripping the cargo into or out of the container and bears every responsibility and liability in such respect.
Indicates that the carrier has received the cargo which is not containerised.
